category.name: Interface.Rich Client
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: WHERE_REFERENCED_RELATIONS_FILTER
preference.preference_description: Specifies the relations displayed in the "Where-Referenced" relation filter combo box, which is used to select relation filter criteria. This enables showing such relations in the combo box, while preventing them to be displayed in the "Paste As" dialog or in defined as child relations. Vertical industry solutions can leverage this preference by adding relations. Valid value of relations are relation internal names (e.g. CP_Has_Has_Copy_Element, CP_Has_Package_Concept).
